name: Idris_Dark_Sheesham_Solid_Wood_Coffee_Table
reviews: Nice sturdy large table love it👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

This table is literally gorgeous. Very easy to assemble and looks great with the matching Accent Table. Overall, I would refer the product to everyone if I cloud especially because it's affordable.The delivery was truly disappointing. It seems like overstock uses UPS as their vendor. UPS said that Overstock provided them with the wrong address which made the package undeliverable. I tried on numerous occasions to contact the UPS facility with the correct details and they kept getting different answers. After about 5 business days, I decided to drive to the UPS facility and pick the packages up on my own. Thankfully, Overstock provides free shipping, but still a bit of an inconvenience.Bottom line, it was worth the drive. Buy the table!
Made from solid wood and very beautiful. They are a little darker than the picture shows. Be aware these are smaller coffee tables, but that is perfect for my small living room

This table is beautiful. The variation of the grain and the colors are great. It matches everything. It is very good quality and easy to assemble. It's heavy because it's solid wood. Very pleased with this purchase.
Beautiful table and at the same time sturdy and a reasonable price for such a nice looking piece of furniture. It was VERY easy to assemble.
The photos don't do this coffee table justice, I was really impressed with the quality and look of this coffee table.
this is a great table. easy to assemble and sturdy

Solid, easy to put together, beautiful wood with no flaws. Only disappointment was the color is a little darker than the picture so it doesn't match the one I already had (bought elsewhere). Also got the accent table and it matched the coffee table perfectly.
Heavy, stout gorgeous wood piece. Has some inconsistency on the shellac though. So check yours thoroughly.
description:
The clean-line design combined with the raw look of the wood grain create a perfect example of rustic modern design. Easy to dress up or dress down for a formal or casual living space. Experience piece-of-mind knowing that this table is made with "green" materials.
Classic, hand-crafted design makes each piece uniqueSimple, clean-lined design, eco-friendly solid wood materials sourced from sustainable, managed plantationsNaturally occurring Sheesham wood characteristics and grain patternsSet includes: One (1) coffee tableMaterials: Solid woodFinish: Dark sheeshamUpholstery color: Dark sheeshamDimensions: 17.75 inches high x 23.5 inches wide x 43.25 inches long Type: Coffee TablesMaterial: WoodStyle: TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredFinish: Brown FinishColor: BrownStyleTransitionalMaterialWoodTypeCoffee TablesFinishBrown FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrown
